Articles.Content:
Craft File:

https://kerbalx.com/GillyMonster/WH40k-Shadowsword-Titan-Hunter

A sister variant of the more common Baneblade. The Shadowsword forgoes the Baneblade's flexibility in favor of mounting a forward fixed Volcano Cannon. This armament, while typically mounted on Titans, allows the Shadowsword to engage enemy Titans and other super heavy vehicles with extreme effectiveness.
